Title: Truffled Mac and Cheese
Writer: Josh Thomas, Thomas Ward, Liz Doran (additional writing), Hannah Gadsby (additional writing)
Actors: Josh Thomas, Debra Lawrance, David Roberts, Charles Cottier
Plot: Patrick moves out. Tom eats all of Josh's special mac and cheese, so Josh traps Tom in his room all day. Arnold tells Josh that he would like to date. Claire and Tom have a heart-to-heart. Claire announces that she's going back to Germany.
